# GD Lounge & Bar - Miami

Premium Lounge & Bar located in Downtown Miami.

## Core Features
- **Hero Video**: Immersive video background showing the lounge atmosphere.
- **Menu**: Extensive menu including Small Plates, Sushi & Sashimi, Maki Rolls, Buns & Dim Sum, and Main Dishes.
- **Events**: Poster-style carousel of upcoming themed nights.
- **News**: Blog-style articles about Miami nightlife and mixology.
- **Lead Capture**: VIP list and reservation forms integrated throughout.

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 16 (Turbopack)
- React 19
- Tailwind CSS 4
- Lucide React Icons
- Embla Carousel for horizontal scrolling

## Project Structure
- `/app`: Main routes and page logic.
- `/components`: UI sections and reusable components like `LeadForm`.
- `/lib`: Data files (`menu-data.ts`, `news-data.ts`) and utilities.
- `/public`: Static assets (images, videos).
